Sentencas: Corrosion kinetics of ferritic alloys/steels (Crofer22APU, ITMLC, ZMG232L) were studied at high temperature.
Titulo: Influence of Protective Layers on SOFC Operation

Sentencas: An extent of corrosion was evaluated by measuring the oxide scale thickness and the weight gain as a function of heating time.
Titulo: Influence of Protective Layers on SOFC Operation

Sentencas: It is shown that even porous layer applied to interconnect can significantly reduce the rate of the steel oxidation.
Titulo: Influence of Protective Layers on SOFC Operation

Sentencas: Contribution of the oxide component into the total degradation of the SOFC stack performance is estimated.
Titulo: Influence of Protective Layers on SOFC Operation

Sentencas: Different protection materials and combinations were tested to analyze their influence on the processes of high temperature oxidation and long-term degradation of Fe-Cr steels.
Titulo: Influence of Protective Layers on SOFC Operation

Sentencas: It has been shown that more soft materials on the basis of spinels (Mn(Co1-xFex)(2)O-4, Cu1-xNixMn2O4) are most suitable materials for the use as protective layers in comparison to perovskites.
Titulo: Influence of Protective Layers on SOFC Operation

Sentencas: The efficiency of different protective materials was also tested in the real SOFC stacks designed in cooperation with company Staxera GmbH.
Titulo: Influence of Protective Layers on SOFC Operation

Sentencas: It has been shown that applied spinel materials can effectively increase the long-term stability of the SOFC stacks.
Titulo: Influence of Protective Layers on SOFC Operation
